Evonik's symposium presentation to LCB

LCB's CEO motioned presentation to explain Expanded Liners method to potencial customers.

In the first meeting to brief the presentation, Javier Galego (LCB's CEO), challenged me to do something original, beautiful and motioned.

But, it's wasn't the whole challenge. He wants to show that Expanded Liners really matters to keep nature safe where oil pipelines passes by.

He also hired me to translate everything, because he is Argentinean, and barely speaks portuguese.

After all, I created an art concept based on leaves, who transports life in their ducts.

With the art concept approved, I coded an Artificial Intelligence Action Script Class, called Live Leaves, with aleatory shining representing life passing by a lot of leaf ducts.

Then, i build a presntation AS3 core to remotely control the slides. And finally packed every thing with Adobe Air.
